title: A Brush With Fame
description: I never dreamed when I accepted a makeup artist job on a blockbuster movie set that I would catch the attention of Evan Hutchinson, the charming British heartthrob. Through a series of events, I find myself employed as Evan’s personal makeup artist. I’ve been telling myself this was arranged solely for my career advancement. But I’m learning that’s not exactly true—especially after Evan kisses me, then asks me out. Before long, we’re falling for each other.Filming takes us to Canada, where our love deepens, and I lose my virginity to a movie star. Every aspect of our personal world is perfect. Until we return home, and the truth of our situation sinks in. I’m involved with a widely recognized celebrity. Our relationship must withstand the pressures of being in the public eye as we strive to balance our careers and personal lives. To be blunt, everyone wants my boyfriend.As the months pass, my concerns about building a future with Evan intensify. The feeling of time slipping away is making me realize that our goals, including starting a family, are no longer aligned. And I’m unsure if we can continue this relationship and both be genuinely happy.
author: Melinda Hazen
